title: A Different Light
description: From the author of Moments in Time comes the story of Athena Morna, a devoted wife of police officer Johnny Moran--until a drug dealer's bullet made her a widow. Now Athena has been asked to run for major. But just as the wheels begin turning, she realizes she is only a pawn in a game of power. Her only ally is Quentin Forbes, the town's best news reporter.
author: Mariah Stewart
